## Source: amazon-inspector (ee81b2442f4cf9659439b86f4d75212f59a5471403e97b4720448df2997d1561)
The package vscode-azure-mcp-server was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3a845389bfce8082a48b1b9b69690f3bd7928b1e682e192f8b8699c7c5845768)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vscode-azure-mcp-server' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
